tag_list: sem, seo, social-media, local, mobile, social, ecommerce, online-advertising, digital-marketing, saas
overview:
Todd Herrold is a senior technology executive with 15+ years experience in product strategy, product development, business development, sales, marketing and general management.

Todd is currently Senior Director, Product Marketing at Kenshoo for its social media marketing platform, Kenshoo Social. Prior to Kenshoo, he served in various search, social, mobile and local online advertising roles at AT&T, Time Warner, Dow Jones, International Data Group (IDG), Register.com and Yodle.

He holds a BA from Wesleyan University and an MBA in Finance and Marketing from The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.

degrees.subject: Marketing & Finance
